snippet: STACIVA--Camille. Died on June 19 at age 73. Daughter of a psychiatrist and a graphic artist. Like her sister, Cleo Whitten, graduated from Harvard College. Then made a 30-year career in market research in New York City, working for ad agencies (Advertising to Women, J Walter Thompson, Kenyon & Ekhardt, others). She leaves her partner of 52 years, Jack Linn, long-time Assistant Commissioner at New York City Parks, her sister Cleo, her niece Jennifer Govan, and nephews Peter, Adam and Joshua Tomei. Wake: Monday, June 27 5-8pm. Service: Tuesday, June 28, 11am. Both at Greenwich Village Funeral Home, 199 Bleecker St., near 6th Ave. 1/3
